arts.ttl: Burnley player ratings vs Plymouth Argyle as three men handed 9/10s in five-star showing - gallery
arts.sum: Five-star Burnley routed bottom side Plymouth Argyle last night to keep up the pressure at the top of the Championship table.

arts.ttl: Whittaker 'didn't show up in time' for Burnley game
arts.sum: Plymouth Argyle forward Morgan Whittaker misses his side's 5-0 loss to touted transfer destination Burnley as he "did not show up" in time.

arts.ttl: Championship roundup: Burnley thrash Plymouth and Leeds return to top
arts.sum: Burnley win 5-0 at Home Park to keep pace with leaders Leeds back at summit after 2-0 win over Norwich Burnley scored five goals in a stunning first-half performance as they hammered relegation-threatened Plymouth 5-0 at Home Park to continue their promotion charge in the Championship. Zian Flemming and Josh Laurent bagged braces while Josh Cullen also struck in a remarkable opening 45 minutes to leave the Clarets, unbeaten in 15 games, two points behind second-placed Sheffield United. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Scott Parker's immediate reaction to Burnley's five-star showing against Plymouth Argyle
arts.sum: Scott Parker was delighted with the way his Burnley side executed his gameplan to a tee during their five-star showing against Plymouth Argyle.

arts.ttl: Burnley hammer Plymouth after devastating first-half display
arts.sum: Burnley scored five goals in a stunning first-half performance as they hammered relegation-threatened Plymouth 5-0 at Home Park to continue their promotion charge in the Championship.

arts.ttl: Burnley hammer Plymouth after devastating first-half display
arts.sum: The Clarets were 5-0 ahead at the break.

arts.ttl: Plymouth Argyle 0-5 Burnley: Bottom side swept aside as Clarets rediscover their shooting boots
arts.sum: Burnley blew away bottom side Plymouth Argyle to keep up the pressure on the top two in the fight for automatic promotion.

arts.ttl: Plymouth Argyle boss quizzed about absence of Burnley and Middlesbrough target Morgan Whittaker
arts.sum: Plymouth Argyle boss Miron Muslic declined to comment on Morgan Whittaker’s absence for tonight’s game against Burnley amid intense transfer speculation.

arts.ttl: Burnley team news for Plymouth Argyle test as Clarets target is left out completely
arts.sum: Scott Parker has made one change to his Burnley side for tonight’s clash against Plymouth Argyle.

arts.ttl: Player lined up for move to Plymouth Argyle after failed transfer to Birmingham City
arts.sum: According to a claim in the Dutch media, Plymouth Argyle are showing serious interest in Sparta Rotterdam defender Mike Eerdhuijzen. The 24-year-old was linked with transfer to Birmingham City during the last transfer window, but a move to St Andrew’s never materialised due to a failed medical. De Telegraaf today report on the latest developments The post Player lined up for move to Plymouth Argyle after failed transfer to Birmingham City appeared first on Sport Witness.
